website_summaries.verdict: Four colorful chopping boards that includes food icons to ensure no cross-contamination.
pros: Boards are eco-friendly, high quality and come with an antimicrobial coating
Also included is a ceramic peeler
Color coding, with food icons displayed on every board, firm and large enough to cut various food items
Easy to store in drawers and cabinets
cons: May warp a little when washing in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing seller
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to replace an old set of mats and it broke the first time we used it cutting chicken breast. The seller contacted me quickly to make sure the set was replaced and money refunded because of this (faulty?) mat. While I understand products vary in quality or are faulty sometimes, I valued a lot the effort of the seller to correct it. I now have a happy wife at home, which is priceless in this house!
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PUT THEM IN THE DISHWASHER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe them when they tell you that they're "dishwasher safe" as the ones I've put in my dishwasher have warped. When I first got them one of them was already slightly warped but I didn't care since it was for the "beef/red meat" one which I rarely use. After putting them in the dishwasher for first time most of them warped which make them hard to use as it makes it hard for the food to stay on and to cut on an uneven surface. So if you buy them make sure to only hand-wash them yourself so you don't end up with warped ones.
customer_reviews.author: AJMX83

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting boards - until put in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Very substantial cutting boards that feel firm and are large enough to cut various foods with! Update (from 5 to 4 starts): Previous reviewers mentioned that the boards warp if put in the dishwasher. I must agree with this. After one time in the dishwasher, a couple of them are no longer completely flat. I can still use them to cut meat and fish, but they would be inconvenient to chop vegetables on, which would then roll off the board. Despite that, I like that they can be conveniently sanitized by putting them in the dishwasher, and are quite thick compared to other cutting boards. In all, I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: me123

customer_reviews.title: Great to store
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I can store a cutting (the whole set) without curling and taking up more space. I also feel this is far easier to sanitize than wooden boards, especially using hydrogen peroxide. It can be tossed into the dishwasher. I like the little thing you put under your board so it doesn't slide on slippery counter surfaces. What I don't like about this product? Nothing!
customer_reviews.author: JoHarring0604

customer_reviews.title: Chinese crap
customer_reviews.text: Product description was misleading. Thought it was an American made product. Was actually made in China. I am done with buying toxic Chinese crap so I returned it. Amazon needs to have a USA made filter to make it easier to find USA made products.
customer_reviews.author: emer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work!!
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are on the slippery side so if you are cutting something that is already juicy you may have additional problems. These have however become my go to cutting boards for work. They are great for cutting syrofoam on clean up nicely (they don't hold the little particles from the foam) so cleanup is nice and easy!
customer_reviews.author: nc

customer_reviews.title: Love that this set comes with a board for each ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that this set comes with a board for each type of item you'd be using it for. The peeler is better quality then the stainless steel one I have in my kitchen. These hold up well when chopping, slicing, and dicing. I wash them by hand since people reported putting them in the dishwasher warped them. So far I've been using them for almost a year with no quality concerns or issues. Great product and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: If you need a steady cutting board, this item is for you.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cutting boards that tend to slip around on the counter. With this safety mat, no slipping occurs and we feel much safer and less frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few years and have only been through a couple. They last a long time. Retains the color. Easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gobi55

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Only been using this for 3 days. Locks my cutting board to a tile counter like glue. Exactly what I wanted to happen. Long term yet to be determined. As described. Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: inlinereed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted I needed. Perfect size. And love having many for different reason. The little knife that comes with it was a nice surprise and cuts so well!
customer_reviews.author: GlitterjenTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have limited counter space and love the thin and compact design! They are the PERFECT size.
customer_reviews.author: nac

customer_reviews.title: Nice small Cutting Board with a good sharp knife
customer_reviews.text: We like this small plastic cutting board, even though it is small it is sturdy and strong. The small knife given with it is also sharp and good. Overall this product is absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen-suji

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to keep my kitchen organized
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to keep my kitchen organized. I like the way the boards feel, but as always happens with plastic boards, one has to be careful with heat and eventual food entrapment in future cuts. They are very easy to clean. The ceramic knife is a plus, great to cut vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Beny

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are light weight but very sturdy. Thin so easy to store. Bright colors. Easy to clean just pop in dishwasher. I am buying more for gifts for my grown daughters for Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wash up great, dishwasher friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cutting boards, easily fit in dish washer and wash up great! Just the right size for cutting jobs. Mom asked for a set after using mine and have gifted two more sets as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rana Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Knife is terrible, customer service is great
customer_reviews.text: The knife include is not durable at all however customer service is great and fixed my issue, cutting boards works great!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of cutting boards!
customer_reviews.text: Thin, but not floppy. They look great, too! And the knife is super sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy storage
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Really nice so you don’t have raw meat contaminating fruits and veggies. They dry pretty and are easy to store. It’s really nice that they are different colors and each have a picture label!
customer_reviews.author: Kelina Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting boards!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cutting boards. I love how they are color coded so you don't use the same one for different things cutting down on cross contamination. Great product. Highly recommend. I have been using them heavily for months now and they are still holding up really well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Save the germs for the outdoors, these boards are supper clean and dishwashable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these for the special marked meat, poultry, fish and veggies. Would love one for bread and cheese too :-) The knife is really sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Marj

customer_reviews.title: We love our new Resort Chef cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: We love our new Resort Chef cutting boards! Clever that they are color-divided and marked for each kind of food - meat, poultry, fish, veg etc. Unlike our last board they go in the dishwasher! Makes me feel like they will be more sanitary over time.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: love the icons
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciated that it had a icon on each board. this really helps to keep the right food on the right board. they are very sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Robyn McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: I hated having to always clean and sanitize my woodblock cutting ...
customer_reviews.text: These do what they are supposed to do. I hated having to always clean and sanitize my woodblock cutting board, but these just pop into the dishwasher and are ready to go. I still have my woodblock cutting board for show, but I only cut food on these.
customer_reviews.author: FJRAustin

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The writing on this board, as you can see from the picture, started blurring. So we had to clean and remove all such writings to avoid food be painted with black color.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Savkin

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy... Split in half after less than one week
customer_reviews.text: Cracked (almost in half) when I used a cleaver to cut a small piece of meat. Very thin, brittle plastic. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Borud

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy but thin and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are exactly what I wanted, separate boards for cutting food that shouldn't be mixed e.g. meat, vegetables, garlic etc. They are sturdy but thin and easy to store. This is a great option for when you don't want to keep washing off your cutting board or having your strawberries taste like garlic! The knife is an extra bonus and is very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Lather

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality and eye catching appeal!
customer_reviews.text: The cutting boards and the vegetable peeler are both of a very fine quality, and appear that they will hold up in durability. The colors are vivid, and the coding tabs on the boards will be quite helpful. I purchased these for my sister in law's birthday, and I decided that had to have a set as well!
customer_reviews.author: SHELBY BRANDON

customer_reviews.title: Good Cutting Boards at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using these new cutting boards. They are just the size I was looking for, and I appreciate the different colors so you will use the correct board to cut meat, fish, chicken or veggies. So far these boards have been most satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Susie K.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Because they are thin, they do not take up much drawer space.
customer_reviews.author: dottie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Weights!
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting boards. They are heavier than I expected. I like the little icons and the color coding. No mistakes will be made in using the veggie cutting board to slice raw beef!!
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cutting boards, love the colors and icons!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these cutting boards. The icons on the top allow you to easily keep them separate for different types of foods when using multiple, they are thin which I really like (saves cabinet space), and are the perfect size for anyone cooking for one or two people. If you commonly cook for a family or larger group, it might be helpful to have something a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Design for Quick Meal Prep and Easy Dishwasher Loading
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying these! I have had several other styles of cutting boards previously, but I like the smaller size of these. It is easy to chop, lift and pour into your bowl/pan. I also like that they are straight instead of cupped -- they easily slide into the dishwasher behind the plates on the bottom rack.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but too small
customer_reviews.text: These are reasonable boards. They clean up well but they are not big enough to dice a large onion without being concerned about spillover. The ad did tell the size bu and it sounded good but when put into use it is too small for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect to like these as much as I do. I have tossed out many of my thicker boards and ordered more. Saves so much space and, unexpectedly, the tabs on top are helpful for getting the board out for use. One of my daughters is a chef and she ordered them as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rae

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised to receive the knife with the boards ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to receive the knife with the boards. I was really in need of a knife that cut the way this one does. I also appreciate the information on how to care for it. Finally, the boards seem to be just right for the type of cooking I do. I could also use information on how to properly clean and maintain the boards. At the present time I just wash in dishwater and dish soap, rinse and dry. Maybe that's all that's needed.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Juricek

customer_reviews.title: These are small and not useful to have four of the same size
customer_reviews.text: These are small and not useful to have four of the same size. In addition, they slip and slide on my granite counter tops cause they have no weight. Sure you can put a towel under it, but then I have to clean a towel! arggghh. So these are acceptable if you put them on something that wil keep them from sliding. Asking for a return.
customer_reviews.author: MARK WEBB

customer_reviews.title: Practical, thin, yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and thickness (all 4 stack up to 1/2") of these boards. Icon tabs show what type of food to cut on each board. Very useful set.
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE MANNING

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: We love the boards. They are light, small, store easily, and are tough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Way better than the thin ones that are floppy.
customer_reviews.author: MGardner

customer_reviews.title: - having them handy and being the perfect size facilitates me doing this each time
customer_reviews.text: It has become important to have our kitchen more hygienically maintained. These cutting boards store neatly on a recipe holder making them accessible. Since it is important to use a separate cutting board for fish, meat, etc. - having them handy and being the perfect size facilitates me doing this each time.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Krodel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors! I only wish I bought the larger size. These are durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice .. I purchased for a Christmas gift for my daughter .. Thinking I should get myself one. Arrived safely packed and quick.. Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Agrippe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Works great with me cutting boards. Ready to clean and store
customer_reviews.author: Sleepingbeauty

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase and just what i needed.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found cutting boards that are not as thin as the ones I have bought before. These are strudier and I fell that it would better service what I would be using it for and not have to worry about cutting though it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn U.

customer_reviews.title: Love the tabs
customer_reviews.text: 4 cutting boards and a ceramic paring knife! The boards are thinner than I expected but seem sturdy so far. Dishwasher safe. Love the tabs with pix of cow, fish, chicken and veggies so we use the right board for food safety.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L Draper

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are very thin but not flimsy at all. The are well made and due to the thickness we can store multiple in the place where usually we only had one. I can highly recommend them! Excellent bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a couple of months. I have had similar boards in the past but they warped in the dishwasher, these do not warp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two out of three boards warped first time in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: First time in dishwasher, the red and blue ones warped. They are still useable but I probably need a heavier board that can handle the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  D,

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cutting boards. Durable and washable in dishwasher on sterilize cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Theeeyyy're Great!
customer_reviews.text: These boards are awesome. While marked for different foods one can tape them together and butcher a small animal without worry. Or if not into meat one hugemongus zucchini. The knife never seems to poke through the boards, bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Pb

customer_reviews.title: Truly unique!  Easy to clean and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I like that each cutting board is identified. I also appreciate the fact that they are so easy to story. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: B.  Shuler

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for everyday use also the best to take with you if you going camping.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the thickness of the boards and they work really well. These are the best cutting boards that I have ever used. I especially like that they can be put in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Millington

customer_reviews.title: Good, functioning cutting boards and knife
customer_reviews.text: The knife is very nice. The boards hold up to cutting, but can become a little warped in the dishwasher. The boards are easy to clean/maintain otherwise; I have had no issue with fading, breaking, or staining. Overall good product!
customer_reviews.author: Arlyne

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: These boards looked great but stained the first time I used them. I returned them right away. I was pretty bummed because I loved the concept of separate boards for different foods.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price- love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I first off want to mention how awesome it was to directly hear from the company itself without there being an issue to instigate the conversation. Shows they really care about the customer’s experience and especially if something were to go wrong. And this set for the price is great quality. I love it so far! (PS- nonpaid customer; writing review strictly out of desire to let everyone know this is a great, trustworthy brand!)
customer_reviews.author: Aubriana G.

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sm/medium cutting boards! The ceramic pairing knife is easy to use and sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Randy DeVries

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cutting boards! There is a separate one for garlic and onions even! I have always wanted cutting boards that I can put in the dishwasher. I put one on the bottom rack of the dish washer and it came out perfectly clean and no warping or melting! They were also an incredibly reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice material and the Littlt Matt is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Montoya

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that the cutting boards are big and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the cutting boards are big and delegated for specific food groups to eliminate cross contamination. But they warp!!! The product description said they were guaranteed NOT to warp, but mine did almost immediately. Now they won't lay flat and that makes actually cutting on the cutting boards tricky and potentially dangerous if you cut yourself as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It sucked!!!
customer_reviews.text: It sucked!! It didn’t even work it did not hold, my cutting board is thick and heavy too and it didnt hold SUUUPER UPSET cant return because i split it in half because i use two cutting boards and wanted to test before i bought more
customer_reviews.author: Selene Ramirez Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I love this idea of seperating different board for different type of food. However, it didn't come with a container or stand that keep them at one place. Quality is pretty good, not those flimsy thin plastic. I just wish it comes with a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Just got these boards. Pleased with them so far. They are sturdy and a perfect size for quick chopping. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Smith

customer_reviews.title: An important part of a busy kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect complement to our little kitchen. The colors are bright and so clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size (easy to handle, store, and clean in washing machine); thicker than the typical sheet cutting boards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors and different categories
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and different categories. They make my cooking preparation easier and more healthy. Meanwhile, I sometimes don't feel that I'm cooking but playing some kids' games. I wonder if the traditional wooden cutting boards will still let me feel more Chief in my kitchen...
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoying YUAN

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute. The knife looks like plastic; but don't be fooled. The knife is sharper than it appears. I sliced my fingers twice. This is definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Blank Blank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these, tried other, these are better! And the knife is great...bought a second set.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this item for my teenage daughter who has demonstrated a peak interest in cooking. She loved the colors and how each one details a picture so you are not using the dame board for different foods/meats. Excellent choice for product and pricing!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Davis

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The cutting boards are perfect for my needs. The knife is a nice extra.
customer_reviews.author: KatGraff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are simply amazing. They've held up extremely well - no scratches whatsoever, and appear to be coated with something hydrophobic, making them a breeze to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paola V.S.

customer_reviews.title: but they are such a nice quality carving board
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered for my Daughter, but they are such a nice quality carving board, ordered extra for daughter in law and myself! Thank you for such a quality item!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Small and slippery
customer_reviews.text: They’re too small. Don’t stick to surface, so they become slippery when chopping.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda p

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Convenient. The ceramic knife is a nice extra. When using regular knives, the board does show wear quickly.
customer_reviews.author: phylphil

customer_reviews.title: Good but be mindful
customer_reviews.text: These are good cutting boards just be mindful when placed in the dishwasher with a dryer setting they will warp a bit!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love these cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: Love these cutting boards. They store easily, don’t slip around while cutting, and clean up easily. They seem very durable but I haven’t had them long enough to say for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like....these are a fun splash of color for the kitchen and they're also awesome for crafting purposes as well (xacto knife works well with these).
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love this ! Great quality and price. Arrived as stated. Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Chop chop away 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go on top of the wood cutting board, excellent choice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: The cutting boards are about the size of a sheet of paper, and they are nice for using for the different food groups. I am pleased with these and love the bonus gift of the ceramic knife.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Debes

customer_reviews.title: Cutting Boards
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected they look real nice. They have not been opened yet as they are a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Allen C Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: They are thick and sturdy. Just exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: The one real issue I have with these boards are that they slide around very easily on my porcelain counter tops. I always have to put a pad of some kine under them to prevent that. I have used all the boards a few times and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Fits our new dishwasher perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love these cutting boards. They're smaller than what we've had but it fits better in our new dishwasher. The cutting boards we had before were thin and started warp in the dishwasher so the these thicker ones are soooooo much better.
customer_reviews.author: MVMom

customer_reviews.title: Loved these cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: Loved these cutting boards! They were exactly what I needed. Large and very thick & sturdy. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: h

customer_reviews.title: A bit thin
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as I was expecting. I'll probably have to replace often as I do quite a bit of chopping.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Childs

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of these. Use a couple of them every time I cook. And the bonus knife is nice too. Easy to store as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meg F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only used them a couple of times and they work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive everything that is listed with the purchase of these cutting boards. No non slip mat or ceramic peeler :( overall the cutting board look like they will do the job but haven't used them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No packing material.
customer_reviews.text: Cutting boards are very nice, waiting to use the knife. There was no packing just the box they come in. The box was opened but everything was there.
customer_reviews.author: John Motter

customer_reviews.title: Convenient cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting boards. Love that they are labeled. Makes chopping and dicing a breeze in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Gaynor

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy therefore easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy therefore easy to manage. I also loved the fact that they are organized by type of food. For example, the red cutting board is for pork, green is for vegetables, etc. The size is perfect, they fit in any part of the kitchen and they are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Flor Berman

customer_reviews.title: She has limited space and this was perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I actually ordered this item for my Daughter's new Apartment. She has limited space and this was perfect for her. It's colored coded for all types of meat and veggie preps...she absolutely loves it. This product is awesome! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: These boards arrived in a timely manner and so far seem to be just what we wanted. I love the bright cheery colors.
customer_reviews.author: humdinger

customer_reviews.title: I like thickness of the board.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's sturdy. I didn't know it is to be used with a wooden cutting board and it comes with a small sticky pad to keep it from sliding which is nice. I did not receive the FREE peeler no sign of it. The delivery box was clearly abused and the tape was coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition for chefs of all levels
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged boards w innovative icons to help you in food preparation. Easy to store and clean. Great item for kitchens large and small or for intrepid picnic goers or campers. Highly recommend. Very helpful seller as well
customer_reviews.author: Connie Coopersmith

customer_reviews.title: Master chef
customer_reviews.text: Fast service and an excellent product. The knife was an added bonus
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: COLORS GREAT, SIZE GOOD AND EASY TO CUT ON. BRAD
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Knife broke
customer_reviews.text: Cutting boards are great. The knife broken after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

product_meta.title: Kitchen Cutting Board Set of 4 Reversible 15" x 11" Boards with Food Icons - BPA Free FDA Approved & Eco Friendly. Best for Food Safety Has Microban Protection. Includes FREE Ceramic Peeler! (Large)
product_meta.description:
If you tried and loved our original medium-sized chopping boards, then you're going to absolutely love these new, larger cutting boards too! New product in color box. 4 large sized plastic cutting boards + 1 non-slip mat + 1 ceramic peeler. 

Located in Irvine, California we spend as much time as we can entertaining with our friends and family. We are always working to offer quality and affordability and to improve in any way possible. We personally test each and every product we offer, and wouldn't sell anything that we wouldn't use ourselves. When you buy from Resort Chef International you are supporting a family run company owned and operated in the USA.

Product Features:
- Red for meats, used to cut beef or pork on.
- Yellow for poultry, to cut chicken, duck, or game hen on.
- Blue for seafood, to cut fish or other seafood on.
- Green for veggies and fruit.

Reversible / Double Sided:
Our boards are designed to be used on both sides, which means you have twice the lifespan of a normal cutting board. No board will last forever, and the FDA recommends that cutting boards be replaced once deep knife grooves are cut into the board, as bacteria can more easily form.

Where to Use
Our boards can be used anywhere a cutting board is normally used. Because of their size and durability, customers have enjoyed using our Resort Chef medium and large boards in: home kitchens, professional kitchens, restaurants, small kitchenettes, flats, apartments, boats, when camping, during barbeques (BBQ), and picnics. NASA might even use these on the International Space Station, due to their small and compact size.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee:
If you have a question or concern, reach out to us here. We want you to be fully satisfied with your purchase.

What You Get:
- 4 Color Coded Plastic Cutting Boards (15.0" x 11.6" x 0.1"
- 1 Non-slip mat (5" x 5")
- 1 Ceramic 3" paring knife
